mapper.select: select max(sn) from shop_goods where sn like CONCAT(#{currentTime},"%")

SELECT B.name AS goodsName,A.id AS id, (select name from shop_shop where shop_shop.id = A.shopId) AS shopName, (select name from shop_product where shop_product.id = A.productId) AS productName FROM shop_price_tag AS A LEFT JOIN shop_goods AS B ON A.goodsId=B.id WHERE 1=1
AND B.brandId=#{brandId}
AND B.name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{goodsName},"%")
AND B.id in (SELECT goodsId FROM shop_category_relation WHERE categoryId=#{categoryId})
AND A.shopId in (${shopIds})
ORDER BY B.name
SELECT * FROM shop_price_tag WHERE id IN #{item} ORDER BY goodsId,productId
